snippet: The attackers appeared to number perhaps 10 or 15, said the French military spokesman, Col. Thierry Burkhard. “A half-dozen” were confirmed killed, he said.
abstract: Small band of radical Islamist fighters battles French and Malian soldiers in firefight in Timbuktu after infiltrating city; attackers appeared to number perhaps 10 or 15, and six are confirmed killed in first such violence in city since Jan 2013.
lead_paragraph: The attackers appeared to number perhaps 10 or 15, said the French military spokesman, Col. Thierry Burkhard. “A half-dozen” were confirmed killed, he said.

headline.seo: Islamist Fighters Repelled in Assault on Timbuktu
headline.main: Islamist Fighters Slip Back Into Timbuktu and Are Repelled by French and Malians
headline.print_headline: Islamist Fighters Slip Back Into Timbuktu and Are Repelled by French and Malians
